Articles.Content: Cant acces it, whats that video (photo or post) about?
It's a photo, 100 million for a recovered parachute and vessel!
What's the texts in the photo says ? Can't get enough resolution...
Moved this over to General Discussion, not really Science Lab material.

Holy karp.

94 million worth of radial chutes? What does that even look like??!?!

It's pretty obvious that there was a variable rollover there and the parachutes actually somehow got flagged as having negative value... on an unsigned variable (ie. it can only be positive, not negative).
I wish money worked that way in real life

Wow.... 94 million recovery... and that was with only a 45% recovery!

I guess you won't need to worry about funding for a long time
You managed to catch a nest of Kraken eggs in the parachutes.

> 
> I wish money worked that way in real life

Sometimes bank errors work that way in real life

But then you can go to jail if you actually use the money

> 
> Sometimes bank errors work that way in real life
> But then you can go to jail if you actually use the money

My experience with Monopoly has taught me that you get to keep bank errors in your favor...oh wait, I did go to jail. Didn't even get to pass Go.
